education.institution: South China University of Technology, Guangzhou, Guangdong, China

awards.title: Second Prize in the 2023 CUMCM (National Level)
awards.awarder: China Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
awards.summary: Awarded the second prize in recognition of outstanding performance in the 2023 CUMCM, a prestigious competition in mathematical modeling and problem-solving.

awards.title: First Prize in the 2023 APMCM
awards.awarder: Beijing Society of Image and Graphics
awards.summary: Awarded the first prize for excellence in mathematical modeling in the APMCM, an esteemed competition in the Asia-Pacific region focused on mathematical problem-solving.

awards.title: First Prize in the 2024 'ShenZhen Cup' Mathematical Modeling Challenge Final
awards.awarder: China Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
awards.summary: Participated in the final defense at Shenzhen MSU-BIT University(SMBU) and won the first prize for the competition topic.

awards.title: Second Prize in the 2024 CUMCM (National Level)
awards.awarder: China Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
awards.summary: Awarded the second prize for outstanding performance in the 2024 CUMCM, a leading competition in mathematical modeling and applied problem-solving.

Scholarships.title: National Scholarship
Scholarships.awarder: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China
Scholarships.summary: Awarded the National Scholarship for academic excellence and outstanding achievements during the 2023-2024 academic year.

Scholarships.title: Tencent Corporate Special Scholarship
Scholarships.summary: Awarded the Tencent Corporate Special Scholarship for outstanding academic achievements and contributions.
